sentence: KIBBUTZ  BE'ERI,  Israel  —  Who  were  the  militants  who  swept  in  from  Gaza  to  southern  Israel  on  Oct.  7  and  killed  more  than  1,400  men,  women  and  children?Some  of  them  spray  painted  their  names  and  the  names  of  militias  in  blue,  brown  and  green  letters  on  the  outside  walls  of  a  home  they  ravaged.
But  hundreds  of  Hamas  fighters  were  killed,  and  dozens  were  detained,  by  Israeli  forces.

He  said  Mohammed  had  made  it  a  mile  or  two  inside  Israel  when  an  Israeli  aircraft  shot  him  —  five  bullets  to  the  chest,  one  near  the  neck  —  and  recited  the  shahada,  Islam's  affirmation  of  faith,  before  he  died  from  his  wounds.

He  said  Mohammed  had  made  it  a  mile  or  two  inside  Israel  when  an  Israeli  aircraft  shot  him  —  five  bullets  to  the  chest,  one  near  the  neck  —  and  recited  the  shahada,  Islam's  affirmation  of  faith,  before  he  died  from  his  wounds.
At  Be'eri,  gunmen  waited  for  a  car  to  approach  and  open  the  kibbutz's  main  gate,  before  shooting  the  driver  and  infiltrating  the  community.

In  one  of  the  most  gruesome  scenes  screened  to  foreign  media,  a  man  calls  out  for  a  knife  and  calls  to  cut  off  a  wounded  man's  head,  before  attempting  to  behead  him  with  a  garden  hoe.
In  the  videos,  the  men  claim  their  orders  were  to  kill,  and  to  take  many  hostages  back  to  Gaza.
"Your  son  killed  Jews,"  the  voice  says.
